description.full: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 2-4, HD (High Definition). Buy the full version of Alien Hominid HD, the award-winning classic from the Behemoth. Includes 16 full levels in beautiful high-definition, 7 mini-games, and 50 all new PDA levels. With completely hand-drawn graphics, this one-of-a-kind Xbox LIVE Arcade title will make your console happy again! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: Purchase the full game and get busy with all 16 levels of multiplayer arcade mayhem. With 7 mini-games, 12 Achievements, and an award winning Pudding Boss, this full version of Alien Hominid will keep your Xbox 360 joyously ecstatic.
